code: import axios from'../../axios-orders';import*as actionTypes from'./actionTypes';export var addIngredient=function addIngredient(name){return{type:actionTypes.ADD_INGREDIENT,ingredientName:name};};export var removeIngredient=function removeIngredient(name){return{type:actionTypes.REMOVE_INGREDIENT,ingredientName:name};};export var setIngredients=function setIngredients(ingredients){return{type:actionTypes.SET_INGREDIENTS,ingredients:ingredients,totalPrice:4,error:false};};export var fetchIngredientsFailed=function fetchIngredientsFailed(ingredients){return{type:actionTypes.FETCH_INGREDIENTS_FAILED,ingredients:ingredients};};export var initIngredients=function initIngredients(){return function(dispatch){axios.get('https://poke-builder-87324-default-rtdb.firebaseio.com/ingredients.json').then(function(response){dispatch(setIngredients(response.data));}).catch(function(error){dispatch(fetchIngredientsFailed(error));});};};
